text: Ezɨ azuarir kaba arɨmariar gumazamizir avɨrim dar iti, damazir okavɨrɨziba ko suer kuraba, ko soroghafariba amɨraziba.5:3-4 Fofozir gumazir maba ghaze, akar igharazir mam uaghan vezɨn kam iti. Akar kam kamakɨn: “Me dɨpar kam siravamangasa, me a mɨzuai. Dughiar maba Ekiamɨn enselɨn mam ghuaghirigha dɨpam gamima a siravamadi. Dɨpam siravamangigha gɨvazɨ, gumazir arɨmariar manam itim, a dɨpamɨn aven magɨrɨgh, egh ua deragham.”
